DepartureCities.City: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - Cuenca del Guiniguada

Staterooms.Name: Inside
Staterooms.Description: Comfortable stateroom with two twin beds that convert to a Royal King, sitting area, and private bathroom.

Staterooms.Name: Deluxe Inside
Staterooms.Description: Upgraded interior stateroom with added amenities and more space.

Staterooms.Name: Family Inside
Staterooms.Description: Spacious interior stateroom suitable for families, with additional bedding options.

Staterooms.Name: Studio Inside
Staterooms.Description: Compact and efficient interior stateroom designed for solo travelers.

Staterooms.Name: Ocean View
Staterooms.Description: Stateroom with a large picture window providing a beautiful view of the ocean.

Staterooms.Name: Deluxe Ocean View
Staterooms.Description: Enhanced ocean view stateroom with extra space and upgraded amenities.

Staterooms.Name: Family Ocean View
Staterooms.Description: Spacious ocean view stateroom suitable for families, with additional bedding options.

Staterooms.Name: Studio Ocean View
Staterooms.Description: Efficient ocean view stateroom perfect for solo travelers, with a large window for great views.

Staterooms.Name: Balcony
Staterooms.Description: Spacious stateroom with a private balcony, two twin beds that convert to a Royal King, sitting area, and private bathroom.

Staterooms.Name: Deluxe Balcony
Staterooms.Description: Upgraded balcony stateroom with additional living space and premium amenities.

Staterooms.Name: Extended Balcony
Staterooms.Description: Balcony stateroom with extended balcony space and upgraded features.

Staterooms.Name: Studio Balcony
Staterooms.Description: Compact balcony stateroom designed for solo travelers, with private balcony and stunning views.

Staterooms.Name: Grand Suite
Staterooms.Description: Luxurious suite with a separate bedroom, large balcony, and additional living space.
Staterooms.Facilities: Private balcony, enhanced room service, complimentary laundry service, priority boarding, and concierge service.
Staterooms.Benefits: Access to exclusive areas such as the suite lounge and private sundeck, reserved seating in entertainment venues, and priority reservations for dining and spa services.

Staterooms.Name: Owner's Suite
Staterooms.Description: Exclusive suite with a large private balcony, living and dining areas, and luxurious amenities.
Staterooms.Facilities: Private balcony, enhanced room service, complimentary laundry service, priority boarding, and concierge service.
Staterooms.Benefits: Access to exclusive areas such as the suite lounge and private sundeck, reserved seating in entertainment venues, and priority reservations for dining and spa services.

Staterooms.Name: Junior Suite
Staterooms.Description: Cozy suite with a private balcony and additional living space.
Staterooms.Facilities: Private balcony, enhanced room service, complimentary laundry service, priority boarding.
Staterooms.Benefits: Access to reserved seating in entertainment venues and priority reservations for dining and spa services.

Staterooms.Name: Studio Suite
Staterooms.Description: Luxurious suite for solo travelers, with a private balcony and premium amenities.
Staterooms.Facilities: Private balcony, enhanced room service, complimentary laundry service, priority boarding.
Staterooms.Benefits: Access to reserved seating in entertainment venues and priority reservations for dining and spa services.

Entertainment.Name: Headliner's Comedy Club
Entertainment.Description: The Headliner's Comedy Club is a popular entertainment venue on the ship. It offers a variety of comedy shows and performances, as well as a bar and restaurant.

Dining & Bars.Name: Illusionarium
Dining & Bars.Description: Enjoy the ambiance in the Illusionarium, our intimate theatre experience featuring a variety of musical entertainment.

Services.Name: WIFI
Services.Description: UNLIMITED WI-FI: General web browsing, emails and messaging. Does not support streaming functions. $29.99/per day for 1 device; $45.98/per day for 2 devices. UNLIMITED PREMIUM WI-FI: Includes audio and video streaming via your favorite provider or app plus VPN access. $39.99/per day for 1 device; $65.98/per day for 2 devices. (The Wi-Fi Information are provided here for reference only. The details of use and price on board shall prevail.)
